title: UGREEN PD 20W USB C Charger Cable Set for iPhone Charger Lightning Cord Type C Fast Charging Wall Plug with Lightning Cable 1M Compatible for iPhone 14 Pro Max/13/12/11/Xs, iPad 7-9/ mini 5/ Air 3

all_images.alt: UGREEN PD 20W USB C Charger Cable Set for iPhone Charger Lightning Cord Type C Fast Charging Wall Plug with Lightning Cable 1M Compatible for iPhone 14 Pro Max/13/12/11/Xs, iPad 7-9/ mini 5/ Air 3

raw_desc: 【PD 20W Fast iPhone 14 Charger】: 20w output enables this USB C fast charger to charge the latest iPhones/iPad at a full speed. For example, iPhone 14 Pro can be charged from 0% to 50% within only 0.5h, which is as fast as the original iPhone charger, and much faster than old 5V / 1A iPhone charging adapter. 【MFi Certified Fast Charger Cable】: Built with Mfi certified chip, UGREEN USB-C to Lightning iPhone charging cable ensure 100% compatibility of fast charging and syncing for all 8-pin lightning iOS iPhone charger devices. No warning message pop-up. 【Universal Compatibility USB Charger】: This USB C Charger can quick charge for PD & QC devices like iPhone 14 Pro/14 Pro Max/14 Plus/14, 13 Pro/13 Pro Max/13/13 mini, iPad Pro, iPhone 12 mini/12/12 Pro/12 Pro Max/ 11/11 Pro/11 Pro Max, iPhone XR / XS Max/XS/X/8, Samsung S22 S21 Note9 A70, Oneplus 10/9/8, P30 Honor 20, Google Pixel 3A, Xiaomi Redmi Note 7, Nokia, Switch and more. For USB C port devices, please prepare a USB C to USB C cable for connecting with this PD 20W USB C wall charger. 【Safe and Reliale PD charger】: Built-in multi-protections, this Type C PD charger plug can effectively protect your device away against over-charging, over-current, over-voltage and ensures the safety of you and your devices. Withstand 15,000+ bending test, the usb c to Lightning iPhone charging cable is stronger and long-lasting. 【Convenient and Cost-effective】: Comes with both iPhone charger adapter and MFi Lightning iPhone cable, no need to buy an iPhone charging cable separately, a time-save and cost-effective choice for you. The fast charger also can charge USB C devices like Samsung, Huawei, Oneplus with an additional USB cable. The compact and lightweight design make this PD charger a perfect travel companion. 【What You Get】: 1 * UGREEN iPhone Charger Combo White ( USB Charger Plug + 1Meter iPhone Cable), 1 * user manual, 24-month warranty, 24-hour customer service, lifetime technical support.
